terms: ***GGP’s Equity Committee Withdraws All Objections And Agrees to Support Brookfield-Led Proposal***
***Revised Agreement Provides Enhanced Transaction Terms and Deal Certainty***

**General Growth Properties Submits Revised $[[USD Value 4: Number]] Billion Investment and an additional $[[USD Value 1: Number]] Billion Backstop Offer From Brookfield, Pershing Square and Fairholme, Seeks Court Approval for Bidding Procedures**
